text: Yithi (Muhammad): “Ngubani na oninika umfunzelo ovela esibhakabhakeni nasemhlabeni? Ingubani uMnini kuva nokubona? Kanti ngubani Oveza abafileyo kwabaphilileyo? Ize ibe ngubani uMlungelelanisi wemicimbi?” Baza kuthi: “NguAllâh.” Yithi: “Ke ngoku anisoyiki (ngokuba nitheni na) isohlwayo sika-Allâh?”
